meanings.definition: Rudely sarcastic or disrespectful in an ironic or mocking way.
meanings.sent1: She made a snarky comment about his outfit.
meanings.sent2: Her snarky remarks always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: His snarky tone added a touch of humor to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: The snarky response cut through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's snarky jokes kept the audience entertained.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of respect or politeness in a way that is clever and humorous.
meanings.sent1: He had a snarky grin on his face as he teased his friend.
meanings.sent2: The snarky waiter made a witty remark about their order.
meanings.sent3: Despite his snarky attitude, he was actually quite friendly.
meanings.sent4: Her snarky sense of humor always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The snarky banter between the siblings was always entertaining.
